EmailTemplate.description: Email to contacts letting them know their contract is about to expire
EmailTemplate.name: 18-03 CL Contract About to Expire
EmailTemplate.subject: Attention: Your Consumer Loan Contract is About to Expire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It looks like your BlueWave Solar Loan Contract is about to expire!
This occurs when a signature hasn't been registered within 14 days of the contract being sent.
Please let us know if you are still interested in signing your promissory note and we will gladly resend your contract.
Additionally, feel free to contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) 786-4100 if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
BlueWave Customer Care
Thank you for helping us to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
